name: Goos Hunt
description:
Infinite rounds, every 10 GOOS they get faster. Each round you get to let 2 GOOS escape, and you get 13 bullets, miss 3 or run out of ammo and the game ends... Each GOOS = 10 points.

Shoot with LMB

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with PyGame

Both source code and .exe file included, devlog on YT/ Cloudless Studio

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspired by Duck Hunt!
